name: Virgin Atlantic VS3046 Full Flight - Inaugural Manchester to London Heathrow (Airbus A320) With ATC
description:
Virgin Atlantic's inaugural 'Little Red' flight, VS3046, from Manchester to London Heathrow on 31 March 2013.

This is the entire flight complete with announcements and Air Traffic Control on approach to Heathrow.

We depart Manchester and fly south towards Heathrow at FL150, having a 10 minute hold at Bovingdon before landing on runway 09L to a flurry of photographers on the ground.  The breakfast and drinks service commenced after we had begun our descent into Heathrow, and not all passengers got served.

The video is taken from seat 13F, the rearmost overwing emergency exit, operating on Airbus A320 EI-DEO, 'Queen of the Cobbles' (operated by Aer Lingus).

Enjoy the flight.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
